extendedInfo.description: ~. T.H.I.S. . A.U.D.I.O. . B.O.O.K. . I.S. . I.N. . E.N.G.L.I.S.H. ~To raise a child can be very tough, but in the end it is very rewarding! To accomplish the best for your child, you need to know how to take care of the child from the day it was born!In this audio book you will learn about:1 - ABC of breastfeeding.2 - Apperance of milk-teeth. 3 - Aptificial diet for infants.4 - Bathing and cleanliness during infancy and childhood. 5 - Crying baby - reasons.6 - Deficiency of milk. 7 - Early detection of disease in the child. 8 - Exposure of infants of open air9 - Mothers' role in combating diseases of children. 10 - Sleep during infancy and childhood. 11 - Stomach and bowel disorders among infants. 12 - Suitable clothing for children. 13 - Teaching a child to walk. 14 - Tips for the safety of kids15 - What to do when your kids cry?This audio book is in English. This audio book require android tts - text to speech.This audio book require internet connection.DISCLAIMER:The text-to-speech (TTS) technology may not be available in some devices. To check if your phone is able of speech synthesis: Menu -> Settings -> Voice input & output -> Text-to-speech settings.If not installed, your device may ask you to install the TTS engine. An internet connection may be required.
